box.findtools¶

Module provides finding functionality based on map_reduce concept and python generators.

Main¶

There are three main functions to find files, strings and python objects.

class box.findtools.find_files(filename=None, filepath=None, *, basedir=None, join=False, maxdepth=None, onwalkerror=None, **kwargs)¶

Bases: box.itertools.map_reduce.map_reduce

default_emitter¶
class box.findtools.find_strings(string=None, *, filename=None, filepath=None, basedir=None, maxdepth=None, onwalkerror=None, **kwargs)¶

Bases: box.itertools.map_reduce.map_reduce
